00018 template <class Attribute>
00019 class TAttributeStaticInfo: virtual public IRealAttributeStaticInfo
00020 {
00021 public:
00022        TAttributeStaticInfo(
00023                             icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00024                             const std::string& id,
00025                             const std::string& description,
00026                             const Attribute* defaultValuePtr,
00027                             int flags,
00028                             const istd::CClassInfo& relatedInterfaceInfo);
00029 
00030        // reimplemented (icomp::IRealAttributeStaticInfo)
00031        virtual const std::string& GetAttributeId() const;
00032        virtual void AddRelatedMetaId(int metaGroupId, const std::string& id, int flags);
00033 
00034        // reimplemented (icomp::IAttributeStaticInfo)
00035        virtual const std::string& GetAttributeDescription() const;
00036        virtual const iser::IObject* GetAttributeDefaultValue() const;
00037        virtual const std::string& GetAttributeTypeName() const;
00038        virtual IComponentStaticInfo::Ids GetRelatedMetaIds(int metaGroupId, int flags, int flagsMask) const;
00039        virtual int GetAttributeFlags() const;
00040 
00041 private:
00042        std::string m_id;
00043        std::string m_description;
00044        const Attribute* m_defaultValuePtr;
00045        int m_attributeFlags;
00046 
00047        typedef std::map<std::string, int> IdsToFlagsMap;
00048        typedef std::map<int, IdsToFlagsMap> RelatedIdsMap;
00049        RelatedIdsMap m_relatedInterfacesMap;
00050 };

00055 template <class Attribute>
00056 TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::TAttributeStaticInfo(
00057                      icomp::CBaseComponentStaticInfo& staticInfo,
00058                      const std::string& id,
00059                      const std::string& description,
00060                      const Attribute* defaultValuePtr,
00061                      int flags,
00062                      const istd::CClassInfo& relatedInterfaceInfo)
00063 :      m_id(id),
00064        m_description(description),
00065        m_defaultValuePtr(defaultValuePtr),
00066        m_attributeFlags(flags)
00067 {
00068        if (relatedInterfaceInfo.IsValid() && !relatedInterfaceInfo.IsVoid()){
00069               m_relatedInterfacesMap[IComponentStaticInfo::MGI_INTERFACES][relatedInterfaceInfo.GetName()] = flags;
00070        }
00071 
00072        staticInfo.RegisterAttributeInfo(id, this);
00073 }
00074

00076 // reimplemented (icomp::IRealAttributeStaticInfo)

00078 template <class Attribute>
00079 const std::string& TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::GetAttributeId() const
00080 {
00081        return m_id;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 template <class Attribute>
00086 void TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::AddRelatedMetaId(int metaGroupId, const std::string& id, int flags)
00087 {
00088        IdsToFlagsMap& groupMap = m_relatedInterfacesMap[metaGroupId];
00089 
00090        IdsToFlagsMap::iterator foundIter = groupMap.find(id);
00091        if (foundIter != groupMap.end()){
00092               I_ASSERT((flags & (AF_REFERENCE | AF_FACTORY)) == (foundIter->second & (AF_REFERENCE | AF_FACTORY)));    // factory can be combined with factory only and reference with reference
00093 
00094               foundIter->second |= flags & AF_OBLIGATORY;      // is obligatory if once obligatory registred is
00095               foundIter->second &= flags | ~AF_NULLABLE;       // is nullable if always nullable registred is
00096        }
00097        else{
00098               groupMap[id] = flags;
00099        }
00100 
00101        if (metaGroupId == IComponentStaticInfo::MGI_INTERFACES){
00102               m_attributeFlags |= flags & AF_OBLIGATORY;       // attribute is obligatory if one of declared interfaces obligatory is
00103               m_attributeFlags &= flags | ~AF_NULLABLE; // attribute is nullable if all of declared interfaces nullable are
00104        }
00105 }

00130 
00131 template <class Attribute>
00132 IComponentStaticInfo::Ids TAttributeStaticInfo<Attribute>::GetRelatedMetaIds(int metaGroupId, int flags, int flagsMask) const
00133 {
00134        IComponentStaticInfo::Ids retVal;
00135 
00136        RelatedIdsMap::const_iterator foundGroupIter = m_relatedInterfacesMap.find(metaGroupId);
00137        if (foundGroupIter != m_relatedInterfacesMap.end()){
00138               const IdsToFlagsMap& groupMap = foundGroupIter->second;
00139 
00140               for (         IdsToFlagsMap::const_iterator iter = groupMap.begin();
00141                                    iter != groupMap.end();
00142                                    ++iter){
00143                                           const std::string& id = iter->first;
00144                      int idFlags = iter->second;
00145 
00146                      if (((idFlags & flagsMask) == flags)){
00147                             retVal.insert(id);
00148                      }
00149               }
00150        }
00151 
00152        return retVal;
00153 }
